unnormalised: mhaka konnen tori bhartanlea neuro problemam vixim vicharlem. humm, hanv khuimlean suru korum, bhai? neurology mhunllear ek vhodd vishoy! mhaka ugtteponnan disot, stroke ek vhodd problem asa, khas korun pirayella lokam'modim. unch BP ani diabetes, je hanga khub samanya asat, tench bhirant vaddoytat. magir epilepsy asa - dukhachi gozal mhunllear tacher khub zannamchea monant bhram asat. azun khub zannank disota ki ti kasli tori atmacho dako, upchar korpak zata ti condition nhui mhunnon. mhaka dista ki adhik zagrutai zai.

dusri vost mhunllear dukhi. soglleank zata, barabor na? punn konnak tenka kronik migraines astat, cluster headaches, hea sogleanchi zat asli tor tankam khub tras zata (khorench!). tankam khatrenuch neurologistak mellunk zai zankam 15+ dis ek mahinea dukhi astat. toxench, ulo dat ki TB brainacher effect korunk xakta (TB meningitis), khas korun durbol zata immunity aslelea patientam'modim. tumkam he symptoms asle tor ek doctorak bhett dya. mhaje am'machea ixttacho bhavak 2005 vorsa zalem, ani to khub trasacho vell aslo.

nimannem, amchi pirayella lokanchi sankhea vaddot asa, neurodegenerative disease zoxe ki Alzheimer's ani Parkinson's samanya zatat. xigrachem diagnosis khub mhotvachem. toxench, vhodd promannan vitamin D chi kami asli tor tench nerve damage korunk xakta. udentichim 7 AM-9 AM bhitor 15 minitam suryak mellonk prayatn korat. opunnach upchar korunk zaina, ok? eka favo neurologistak mellonk vochat - AIIMS-chea Dr. Shah ekdam boro asa, mhan mhaka aikunk ailem.
normalised: Konnen tori mhaka Bharataantlea sadaronn neuro somseaanche viserle. Bare, hanv khoimchea thavn suru korum, bhai? Neurology ek vhodd field! Mhaka yaad aache tea thavn, stroke ek vhodd somsea, khas korun vaddelea lokank. High B-P ani diabetes, zo hanga khub sadaronn asa, te risk vaddoita. Ani epilepsy asa - vishwas nam, dukachi gosht. Azoonui kitneak tori lagta ki tem eka prakarachem bhut lagla te vorin asa, upchar mellta tea bodlek. Zaiti choukashi zai, mhaka lagta.

Dusri area mankodduk. Soglleank tem mellta, sarke? Pun kitneak tori chronic migraines astat, cluster headaches astat, etcetera je khub trasache astat (sarkich!). Tannim neurologist-ank mellpaak zai jar tannka pandhra disam thavn odik mankodduk aasa mhun. Ani yaad dovor T-B brain-ank affect kortaa (T-B meningitis), khas korun tanchea pasienntank jeanche immunity komi aasa. Doktorank zaldi-zaldi mell jar tumcheak hem lakshan asa mhun. Mhaji aaji-chi sangatichea bhavak hem don hazar ani panch-ant ailem, ani tem khub kashtichem aslem.

Nimanne, amchea vaddeachea lokam sangath, neurodegenerative rog jevun Alzheimer ani Parkinson khub sadaronn zaat aasa. Survateche diagnosi mukhi aasa. Ani vitamin D-chem komi zalear nerve damage zaunk xakta. Saat A-M ani nau A-M-chea bhitar pandhra minutes soorjak poiyeaat. Aapnanchi upchar nakam korunk, borem? Doktorak mell, Doctor Shah A-I-I-M-S-ant khub bore aasa mhun aikola.
